title: IcpMemeDoge ICP Presale Landing Page with Countdown, Progress Tracking, and Contributor List

requirements.text: Create a single-page presale website for the memecoin name “IcpMemeDoge” with a hero section, presale status section, contribution instructions, contributors list, and tokenomics section.

quotes:
IcpMemeDoge

Erstelle ein Presale eines tierischen Memecoins

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page renders without errors and includes clearly labeled sections: Hero, Presale, How to Contribute, Contributors, Tokenomics/FAQ.
All user-facing copy is in English.

requirements.text: Apply a coherent, flashy neon meme aesthetic that uses colorful glow and subtle blinking animations while maintaining readability (accessible contrast for body text, no rapid flashing). Include a colorful glowing/blinking headline for “IcpMemeDoge”.

quotes: Überschrift soll bunt leuchtend blinkend sein
Die Webseite soll bunt leuchten blinkend mit besonderen farben sein , es muss leserlich sein und deswegen passende farben anwenden.

acceptanceCriteria: The main headline has a noticeable glow + gentle blinking animation.
Body text remains readable (no blinking on paragraphs; sufficient contrast on primary content).
Blinking animations are subtle (no strobe-like effect).

requirements.text: Add a 24-hour countdown timer that starts immediately for each visitor and counts down from 24:00:00 to 00:00:00.

quotes: Installiere ein 24h countdown , countdown soll sofort starten.

acceptanceCriteria: On page load, the timer starts at 24:00:00 (or 23:59:59) and ticks down every second.
If the page is refreshed, the timer restarts from 24 hours (per-visitor immediate start).

requirements.text: Display the presale ICP deposit address exactly as provided and place it directly under the presale progress indicator, with a copy-to-clipboard control.

quotes:
Bezahlvorgang verläuft in ICP, die ICP Adresse ist 
a37ba6735ce5a8221f7c35105bff9bb8fc497cc7d5adda5f93d9935558e7d368
unter der Anzeige soll direkt die überweisungswalletadresse sein.

acceptanceCriteria: The address is shown exactly as: a37ba6735ce5a8221f7c35105bff9bb8fc497cc7d5adda5f93d9935558e7d368.
The address appears directly below the progress bar/indicator.
Copy-to-clipboard copies the full address and provides a visible confirmation state.

requirements.text: Implement presale progress tracking where 515,000 ICP received equals 100%. Show a progress indicator from 0% to 100%, including total ICP received and remaining ICP to cap, and mark the presale as ended once 100% is reached.

quotes: 515000 ICP Token beträgt 100%, nach 100% wird der Presale beendet.
Jede überweisung soll automatisiert erkannt werden und von 0% bis 100% in einer Anzeige angezeigt werden

acceptanceCriteria: Frontend displays: percent complete, ICP received, ICP remaining, and a clear “Presale Ended” state at/above cap.
Backend exposes an API that returns current totals and computed percentage based on cap=515000 ICP.
When total received >= 515000 ICP, the presale status returned by backend is ended and UI reflects it.

requirements.text: Automatically detect incoming ICP transfers to the presale address by polling from the frontend and having the backend query the ICP ledger/index source on each poll, updating totals and the contributors list accordingly.

quotes: Jede überweisung soll automatisiert erkannt werden

acceptanceCriteria: Frontend polls the backend at a reasonable interval (e.g., every 10–30 seconds) for updated presale status.
Backend updates totals based on detected ledger activity for the presale deposit account/address.
UI updates progress and contributor list without needing a manual refresh.

requirements.text: Show a public, continuously updated list of all sender wallet addresses that have contributed ICP, including the amount contributed per address and a timestamp/ordering (most recent first).

quotes: Jede  Adresse die ICP versendet hat soll auf der Webseite angezeigt werden.

acceptanceCriteria: UI shows a contributors table/list with at least: sender address, total contributed ICP (aggregated), and last contribution time.
New detected contributions appear in the list automatically after polling.
If multiple transfers come from the same address, they are aggregated per address (or clearly shown as multiple entries) consistently.

requirements.text: Define backend presale accounting so each detected ICP contribution results in an investor allocation of IcpMemeDoge tokens, credited after the presale ends. Implement a backend endpoint to fetch an address’s allocation and a global allocation summary.

quotes: Die gekauften Meme Coins werden nach dem Presale dem Investoren gutgeschrieben.

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores contributions and computed token allocations deterministically (no floating ambiguity).
Backend exposes methods to: (1) get allocation by contributing address, (2) get overall totals (tokens allocated, ICP received).
Allocations are only considered “final” when presale is ended.

requirements.text: Add tokenomics content to the landing page including: max supply of 1,000,000,000 IcpMemeDoge and the promotional claim “100% win chances after the presale” (in English).
acceptanceCriteria: Tokenomics section shows max supply exactly as 1,000,000,000.
Page includes the English version of the claim: “100% win chances after the presale.”

requirements.text: Add clear presale parameters to the UI in English: hard cap (515,000 ICP), payment currency (ICP), and that the presale ends at 100%.

quotes: 515000 ICP Token beträgt 100%, nach 100% wird der Presale beendet.

acceptanceCriteria: UI shows: Hard cap: 515,000 ICP; Currency: ICP; End condition: 100% reached.
These parameters match backend constants used for progress calculations.

requirements.text: Generate and display a custom “special meme dog” hero image for IcpMemeDoge as a static frontend asset.

quotes: Bild soll ein besonderer meme Hund sein

acceptanceCriteria: A generated image exists under frontend/public/assets/generated and is used in the hero section.
Image loads correctly in production build without being served by the backend.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (single-canister backend logic).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutablePaths; only compose and use them.
Presale deposit address must be displayed exactly as provided: a37ba6735ce5a8221f7c35105bff9bb8fc497cc7d5adda5f93d9935558e7d368.
All user-facing text in the app must be English.
nonGoals: Implementing a real transferable on-chain token canister for IcpMemeDoge (token ledger) is out of scope unless explicitly requested.
Integrating external centralized APIs/services for payment tracking is out of scope.
Guaranteeing financial outcomes beyond displaying the requested promotional text is out of scope.

required: Stylized special meme dog character, neon/glow cyber-meme aesthetic, centered hero composition, transparent or dark background (icp-meme-doge-hero.dim_1600x900.png)

preferencesToAdd: User-facing text should be in English.
